statements: SELECT * FROM DriverBehaviorData;
SELECT driver_id, speeding_score FROM DriverBehaviorData ORDER BY speeding_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM DriverBehaviorData WHERE harsh_braking_score > 5;
SELECT * FROM DriverBehaviorData ORDER BY cornering_score;
SELECT AVG(speeding_score) AS avg_speeding_score FROM DriverBehaviorData;
SELECT driver_id, speeding_score, harsh_braking_score, cornering_score FROM DriverBehaviorData WHERE speeding_score > 80 ORDER BY driver_id DESC
SELECT driver_id, speeding_score, harsh_braking_score, cornering_score FROM DriverBehaviorData WHERE harsh_braking_score < 50 ORDER BY harsh_braking_score ASC
SELECT driver_id, harsh_braking_score FROM DriverBehaviorData WHERE cornering_score BETWEEN 30 AND 70 ORDER BY driver_id ASC
SELECT * FROM DriverBehaviorData WHERE harsh_braking_score > 60 AND cornering_score < 40 ORDER BY driver_id DESC
SELECT driver_id, speeding_score FROM DriverBehaviorData WHERE speeding_score >= 70 AND cornering_score <= 50 ORDER BY cornering_score DESC, speeding_score ASC
SELECT * FROM driver_behavior_data;
SELECT driver_id, speed, acceleration FROM driver_behavior_data;
SELECT driver_id, location, timestamp FROM driver_behavior_data;
SELECT * FROM risk_factors;
SELECT driver_id, factor_name, factor_value FROM risk_factors;
SELECT * FROM driver_behavior_data WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY speed DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT driver_id, acceleration, timestamp FROM driver_behavior_data WHERE speed > 80 AND acceleration < 0 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;

SELECT driver_id, location, factor_name, factor_value FROM driver_behavior_data JOIN risk_factors ON driver_behavior_data.driver_id = risk_factors.driver_id WHERE factor_name LIKE '%safety%' AND speed < 60;
SELECT COUNT(driver_id) AS total_drivers FROM driver_behavior_data;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM driver_behavior_data WHERE speed BETWEEN 40 AND 60;
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT driver_name, driver_age FROM drivers WHERE driver_age > 30;
SELECT driver_name, license_number FROM drivers ORDER BY driver_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM trips WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT start_location, end_location, trip_date FROM trips ORDER BY trip_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM drivers ORDER BY driver_id DESC;
SELECT driver_name, driver_age FROM drivers WHERE driver_age > 25;
SELECT * FROM trips WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY trip_date ASC;
SELECT driver_name, start_location, end_location FROM drivers JOIN trips ON drivers.driver_id = trips.driver_id ORDER BY trip_date DESC;
SELECT driver_name, trip_date, speed FROM drivers JOIN driving_logs ON drivers.driver_id = driving_logs.driver_id WHERE speed > 50 ORDER BY trip_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT driver_name, age FROM drivers WHERE age > 25;
SELECT trip_id, start_location, end_location, distance FROM trips WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT driver_name, plate_number, make, model FROM drivers, vehicles WHERE vehicles.vehicle_id = drivers.driver_id;
SELECT incident_id, date_occurred, incident_description FROM incidents ORDER BY date_occurred DESC;
SELECT * FROM drivers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT driver_name, license_number FROM drivers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT driver_name, make, model, year FROM drivers d JOIN vehicles v ON d.driver_id = v.vehicle_id;
SELECT d.driver_name, v.plate_number, t.start_location, t.end_location FROM drivers d JOIN trips t ON d.driver_id = t.driver_id JOIN vehicles v ON t.vehicle_id = v.vehicle_id;
SELECT incident_description, date_occurred FROM incidents WHERE incident_description LIKE '%accident%';
SELECT * FROM driver_data;
SELECT driver_name, license_plate FROM driver_data ORDER BY driver_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM trip_data WHERE start_location='New York';
SELECT driver_name, speed FROM driver_data WHERE speed > 60;
SELECT trip_id, location, incident_type FROM incident_data WHERE severity >= 3 ORDER BY severity ASC;
SELECT * FROM driver_data ORDER BY driver_name DESC, speed ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT driver_name, license_plate, speed FROM driver_data WHERE speed > speed_limit ORDER BY speed DESC;
SELECT trip_id, start_location, end_location, start_time, end_time FROM trip_data WHERE start_time >= '2022-01-01' AND end_time <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY start_time ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT driver_id, driver_name, incident_type, severity FROM driver_data JOIN trip_data ON driver_data.driver_id = trip_data.driver_id JOIN incident_data ON trip_data.trip_id = incident_data.trip_id WHERE severity > 3 ORDER BY severity DESC;
SELECT * FROM risk_factors WHERE description ILIKE '%safety%' LIMIT 5;
